# Random Forest â€” Customer Churn Prediction

This project predicts whether a customer will leave a company (churn) using a Random Forest classifier.

## Features
- Data preprocessing
- Handling missing values
- Encoding categorical variables
- Feature scaling
- Random Forest model training
- Model evaluation
- Save trained model

## Target
Churn (Yes / No)

## How to Run

1. Install dependencies:

pip install -r requirements.txt

2. Run notebook:

jupyter notebook notebook/churn_random_forest.ipynb
